text: Lhéry is a commune. It is in Grand Est in the Marne department in northeast France. ts coordinates are approximately 49.2103°N latitude and 3.7631°E longitude.Lhéry contributes to the rich tapestry of the Marne department. The village lies at an elevation of 174 meters (571 feet) above sea level. Nestled amidst picturesque landscapes, Lhéry offers a glimpse of rural France. As of 2021, Lhéry is home to 86 residents, making it a small and tranquil community. == Related pages == * Communes of the Marne department == References == Category:Communes in Marne
title: Lhéry
